venue.address_2: (A few hundred feet East of Mt. Clinton Rd)
venue.name: AMC Highland Center at Crawford Notch

item.description:
This Sunday we'll be hiking Mt. Avalon, Mt. Field, Mt. Willey and Mt. Tom. The total trip length is 10 miles with an 8 hour book time.

This hike requires that you have recent experience hiking this distance in these conditions. Winter is almost here. It's already snowing in the mountains. Temperatures could be near freezing so proper gear is required.

Please meet at the Highland Center before 8:00 am. We'll wait until 8:15 if anyone is late. I don't usually get cell phone reception in the mountains so I probably won't get any messages. It's about a 3 hour drive from Boston.

Planned Route:

Start at the Avalon Trailhead near the Highland Center.

Hike the Avalon Trail to Mt. Avalon.

Mt. Avalon to the Willey Range Trail to Mt. Field.

Mt. Field to Mt. Willey.

Back across Willey Range Trail to Mt. Tom.

Mt. Tom to A-Z Trail and back to the trail head.

 

Required Gear:

Headlamp (the flashlight app on your iphone doesn't count)

Warm insulating layers (fleece for example)

Waterproof/Windproof Rain coat.

Hat, gloves.

Map and compass.

Your own food and water.

Dogs:

This hike is dog friendly. I'll have my dog with me. If you bring your dog, it is your responsibility to determine if it's capable of doing this hike.

Disclaimer:

As a condition of your voluntary participation in this activity you acknowledge and agree to the following: this activity involves inherent risks that can cause property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death to participants and/or others; you assume all risk associated with this activity; you are responsible for having the necessary knowledge, skills, abilities, clothing, and equipment to safely participate in this activity; you know and will follow the Hiker Responsibility Code; the organizer(s) of this activity are volunteers; and you release, hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer(s) and all members of this group from any and all claims for property damage, injury, illness, disability, and/or death - including those caused by negligence and/or other reasons.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Boone the yellow Lab dog with a blue pack.
item.name: Tom, Field, Wiley and Avalon
